【考法 1】 v. 严厉批评： to criticize harshly and usually publicly
【例】 She was excoriated as a racist. 她被指责是一个种族歧视者。
【近】 abuse辱骂抨击, assail, belabor严厉批评, castigate强烈（公开）指责, excoriate, lambaste, vituperate
【反】 accolade, extol, flatter, praise lavishly 赞扬
【记】 ex- "off" + corium "hide, skin"
Figurative sense of "denounce, censure"
【另】 corium 真皮，皮肤
